bug.author: abfleishman
bug.description: When I extend a bounding box that has already been made by dragging the left side I can extend the box off the image. on the top, bottom or right side of the bounding box does not pass the edge of the image.

comments.comment: Is it the master or dev branch? We rebuild the tagging engine for the new version of VoTT.
This was in the master. So it might be fixed in dev?
Yeah, it should be fixed in dev.
